attributes.action: treat black oversea trained teacher the same as white trained teachers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment there are a lot of children coming from africa to live in britain and are blacks, few are white, any teacher trained in africa are treated like dirts not allowed to teach in schools as a proper teacher, only if you are white, hence the QTS scheme giving the white teachers a free access whether they are experienced or not, please help even the black british teachers like me can not find a qualified job as my white coleague trained in africa, this open discrimination has to stop in the teaching line, no wonder we have a lot of confused children in schools the government is saying one thing and doing another, this kids can see.
